thread.title: Dannii Minogue's body insecurities
thread.title_full: Dannii Minogue's body insecurities - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Dannii Minogue's body insecurities
text:
Singer Dannii Minogue used to think that there was something "wrong" with her because of her petite frame.
READ: Dannii Minogue: Make-up is a time constraint
The 43-year-old, who has five-year-old son Ethan with her former partner Kris Smith, used to be plagued with a number of insecurities about her slender physique because she struggled to find clothes that would fit her "weird" shape, reports femalefirst.co.uk.
For latest Music updates follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
"I always thought there was something wrong with me," Minogue was Quote: d as saying by InStyle magazine.
LISTEN: Songs of Dannii Minogue on Gaana.com
"I was constantly thinking, 'I'm a really weird shape. Nothing fits me. How do other people just take something off the rack and put it on?'" she added.
